text: "Cave paintings that have been found in many parts of the earth
text_id: indicate the presence of non-human beings on our planet. The following depictions are engraved in caves in the mountains of Kimberley Australia
column7: near the Prince Regent River. During a reconnaissance mission in 1838
column8: George Gray found a strange set of petroglyphs
column9: with depictions of humanoids with large eyes and oval heads
column10: figures which refer to our familiar ""greys""."

img_title: The Crucifixion of Christ fresco, by unknown artist, Svetitskhoveli Cathedral in Georgia
text: "UFOs IN MURALS. 17th century mural depicting the crucifixion of Christ. It is located at the Svetishoveli Cathedral in Mtskheta
text_id: Georgia. Observe the two disc-shaped objects on both sides of Christ throwing flames at any direction."

text: "UFOs in ancient manuscripts and texts. The image comes from “Le Livre Des Bonnes Moeurs” (the book of good manners)
text_id: written in 1338. There is a large
column7: round object in the sky that is clearly artificial. But no one in the picture seems to be reacting to it."

text: "a striking image on folio 129 verso. In rich tones
text_id: it depicts the goddess of luck Fortuna beside her wheel
column7: surrounded by a group of male petitioners
column8: with a decorated gold sphere hovering bizarrely in the sky above them. Could it be the sun
column10: or another representation of the wheel of fortune? No one has figured it out
column11: but you bet the ufologists have."
